title: Revo Uninstaller Mobile
description: This useful app helps you to uninstall Android apps, as well as organizing and cleaning your device. Delete all leftovers and hidden ﬁles for a clean and bloatware-free device. Easy to use tool for uninstalling Android apps, their leftovers, and hidden ﬁles. We specialize in app uninstallation and optimization of smartphone storage space. Every app leaves leftover data after uninstalling. Revo Uninstaller Mobile detects these leftovers and removes them after showing you the ﬁles, so you don’t delete anything important by accident. Revo Uninstaller Pro includes all of the Free features plus: Remove ads - remove all in-app ads and enjoy an uninterrupted experience while uninstalling. Create backup - You can create backup ﬁles for your apps, even for categories of apps like all user apps, all system apps, or for all uninstalled apps. Import and compare - create a list of the current state of your device: the apps installed, their names, versions, size, and then compare it with the current state of your device. See the difference in size, name, and version of the apps you have. Check difference - compare selected backup app list with currently installed apps. Customize app categories - create and organize your own custom app groups Revo Uninstaller tools include: Quick Uninstall - remove apps that are no longer needed and at the same time delete all leftovers, junk, and hidden ﬁles at the click of a button. Leftover scan - after uninstalling an app Revo Uninstaller launches a leftover scan which scans through the whole android device for remaining ﬁles and folders connected to the uninstalled app, which are useless and would only slow down your device. Multiple/Batch uninstall - you can select one or multiple apps that you want to remove and just click on the " Uninstall" button. The number of marked applications and the total size of data you are about to delete visible when batch uninstalling. Quick boot mode - for a fast start of the application. Quick boot mode optimizes app loading time by showing you the apk size and not the full size including the connected ﬁles. Search and Sort applications - you can always search for a certain app to uninstall via different ﬁltering and grouping options including typing the name of the app you need. App Ranking - you can see a ranking of your apps, the top 10 Biggest, Newest, Oldest and by Brands. Categories - Revo Uninstaller Mobile organizes your apps by using more than 60 predeﬁned app categories like Tools, Communication, Social apps and more. Uninstall history - you can see a log of the apps you have uninstalled, showing you the dates of uninstallation and a link to the App Store for you to reinstall it, in case you need it again. App Management - You can see the application’s name, version, installation date, size, and have the ability to open it directly in the Google Play Store. App info - every operation with Revo Uninstaller shows you the size of the application including data and cache size. In-app Permission checker - Revo Uninstaller Mobile shows you the permissions you have granted to the apps, so you know what access your apps have to your sensitive information. Different languages - we support 29 different languages. You could change it in the settings as we do not have access to your location. Night mode - the night mode reduces the light emitted by your device’s screen to protect your eyes. Follow us: Facebook https://www.facebook.com/revomobileapps/ Twitter https://twitter.com/vsrevounin Instagram https://www.instagram.com/revouninstallerpro/ *Revo Uninstaller Mobile cannot remove pre-installed apps due to Android OS restrictions.
descriptionHTML:
This useful app helps you to uninstall Android apps, as well as organizing and cleaning your device. Delete all leftovers and hidden ﬁles for a clean and bloatware-free device.

Easy to use tool for uninstalling Android apps, their leftovers, and hidden ﬁles. We specialize in app uninstallation and optimization of smartphone storage space.

Every app leaves leftover data after uninstalling. Revo Uninstaller Mobile detects these leftovers and removes them after showing you the ﬁles, so you don’t delete anything important by accident.

Revo Uninstaller Pro includes all of the Free features plus:

Remove ads - remove all in-app ads and enjoy an uninterrupted experience while uninstalling.


Create backup - You can create backup ﬁles for your apps, even for categories of apps like all user apps, all system apps, or for all uninstalled apps.

Import and compare - create a list of the current state of your device: the apps installed, their names, versions, size, and then compare it with the current state of your device. See the difference in size, name, and version of the apps you have.

Check difference - compare selected backup app list with currently installed apps.

Customize app categories - create and organize your own custom app groups

Revo Uninstaller tools include:

Quick Uninstall - remove apps that are no longer needed and at the same time delete all leftovers, junk, and hidden ﬁles at the click of a button.

Leftover scan - after uninstalling an app Revo Uninstaller launches a leftover scan which scans through the whole android device for remaining ﬁles and folders connected to the uninstalled app, which are useless and would only slow down your device.

Multiple/Batch uninstall - you can select one or multiple apps that you want to remove and just click on the " Uninstall" button. The number of marked applications and the total size of data you are about to delete visible when batch uninstalling.

Quick boot mode - for a fast start of the application. Quick boot mode optimizes app loading time by showing you the apk size and not the full size including the connected ﬁles.

Search and Sort applications - you can always search for a certain app to uninstall via different ﬁltering and grouping options including typing the name of the app you need.

App Ranking - you can see a ranking of your apps, the top 10 Biggest, Newest, Oldest and by Brands.


Categories - Revo Uninstaller Mobile organizes your apps by using more than 60 predeﬁned app categories like Tools, Communication, Social apps and more.

Uninstall history - you can see a log of the apps you have uninstalled, showing you the dates of uninstallation and a link to the App Store for you to reinstall it, in case you need it again.

App Management - You can see the application’s name, version, installation date, size, and have the ability to open it directly in the Google Play Store.

App info - every operation with Revo Uninstaller shows you the size of the application including data and cache size.

In-app Permission checker - Revo Uninstaller Mobile shows you the permissions you have granted to the apps, so you know what access your apps have to your sensitive information.

Different languages - we support 29 different languages. You could change it in the settings as we do not have access to your location.

Night mode - the night mode reduces the light emitted by your device’s screen to protect your eyes.

Follow us:
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/revomobileapps/
Twitter https://twitter.com/vsrevounin

Instagram https://www.instagram.com/revouninstallerpro/

*Revo Uninstaller Mobile cannot remove pre-installed apps due to Android OS restrictions.
summary: Useful tool to uninstall apps, clean leftovers, and optimize your Android device
summaryHTML: Useful tool to uninstall apps, clean leftovers, and optimize your Android device
